text: The Men's 57 kg event at the 2010 South American Games had its quarterfinals held on March 22, the semifinals on March 24 and the final on March 27. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:left" |- align="center" | width=200 bgcolor=gold|Gold||width=200 bgcolor=silver|Silver|| width=200 bgcolor=CC9966|Bronze |- |Angel Rodriguez |Deivis Julio Bassa |Luis Porozo Mina Ignacio Perrin |} ==Results== ==References== *Report 57kg M
title: Boxing at the 2010 South American Games – Men's 57kg
